sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均可表示"主要地，大量地"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: mainly, chiefly, greatly, largely, mostly, primarily, principally, generally
means: mainly ： 指主要部分，突出在一系列事物中的相对重要性。
chiefly ： 侧重某人或某物在众多的人或物中占主要和显著地位。
greatly ： 通常强调程度的高。
largely ： 着重范围或分量大大超过别的成分。
mostly ： 强调数量占多半，近乎全部。
primarily ： 侧重基本地，首要地。

sentence.Network_en: Thousands of people, mainly Zulus, assembled in a stadium in Thokoza.
sentence.Network_cn: 数以千计的人，主要是祖鲁族人，聚集在托考查的一个体育场里。

sentence.Network_en: Our survey revealed that these allergies were mainly one-offs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的调查显示这些过敏多为一次性反应。

sentence.Network_en: There were also several accidents mainly caused by engine failures on take-off.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有几次事故主要是起飞时引擎出现故障造成的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: mainly,chiefly,greatly,largely,mostly,primarily,principally,generally 这些副词均可表示“主要地,大量地”之意。 mainly 指主要部分,突出在一系列事物中的相对重要性.
九年级英语单词表 ... fry 油炸食物 mainly 主要地 stay away from 从……离开.
流向下盘，以是为主(Mainly)胜赔付大于1做了完整对冲，假设主胜打出，不管你对于每天接触的客户具有何种想法，这都无所谓，重 …
新概念英语第二册单词总汇_英语网 ... accurate a. 准确的；正确的 mainly ad. 主要地，大部分 accustom vt. 使习惯，习惯于.

list.abs: line examination system mainly realizes the automatic test scores randomly , etc. Function ., 在线考试系统主要实现了随机抽取试题 , 自动评分等功能.
the knitting products mainly including all stylesof spun silk , silk / cotton nylon and rayon / nylon ., 针织产品主要有以绢丝 , 绢棉 , 绢粘尼龙 , 人造丝尼龙等为原料的各类针织时装.
this factory mainly produces spill and wood chips ., 这家工厂主要生产木片和木屑.

it is considered that high consumption of coal in the gas preparation system in the medium sized plant is mainly because of the improper mode for waste heat recovery .认为废热回收利用方式不合理是中氮造气煤耗高的主要原因，中氮造气存在上行管线过长，下吹蒸汽加入点不合适，吹风气热能利用低等弊端，并提出了改进措施。

entry.def: You use mainly when mentioning the main reason or thing involved in something.

example.ex: The stock-market scandal is refusing to go away, mainly because there's still no consensus over how it should be dealt with...
example.tran: 股票市场的丑闻迟迟没有消散，这主要是因为人们仍未就如何应对它达成共识。

example.ex: The birds live mainly on nectar.
example.tran: 这些鸟主要以花蜜为食。

entry.def: You use mainly when you are referring to a group and stating something that is true of most of it.

example.ex: The African half of the audience was mainly from Senegal or Mali...
example.tran: 观众中有一半是非洲人，其中大多数来自塞内加尔或马里。

example.ex: The spacious main bedroom is mainly blue.
example.tran: 宽敞的主卧室以蓝色为主色调。

auth_sentence.content: The hedges were mainly hawthorn which blossoms in May.
auth_sentence.res_content: The hedges were mainly hawthorn which blossoms in May.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hedges were mainly hawthorn which blossoms in May.

auth_sentence.content: Rainfall is moderate and falls mainly in the winter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rainfall is moderate and falls mainly in the winter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rainfall is moderate and falls mainly in the winter.

auth_sentence.content: Mainly because we have always done it that way.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mainly because we have always done it that way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mainly because we have always done it that way.

Sentence.sentence: What is the presentation mainly about?
What is the recent Harry's Poll mainly about
W : We mainly deal with large volume buyers from western countries and our products have been well received.
It is mainly confined to youngsters
What is the talk mainly about?
That these huge declines didn't lead to depression mainly reflects, as Romer argues, countermeasures taken by the government.
